description:
The great pirate Fisher Tiger keeps his promise to a young slave girl, but the adults in her village are determined to make him pay for his act of honor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eiyuu no Saigo: Tiger Shougeki no Shinjitsu
La fin d`un héros - Les secrets de Tiger
The Death of the Hero! A Shocking Truth of Tiger!
Смерть героя. Шокирующая правда о Тайгере
英雄の最期 タイガー衝撃の真実
